meanings.definition: One who holds extreme views or takes extreme actions.
meanings.sent1: The extremest in the group always wanted to push boundaries.
meanings.sent2: The extremest in the debate made everyone reconsider their opinions.
meanings.sent3: The extremest at the party suggested skydiving as a casual activity.
meanings.sent4: She was the extremest of all the hikers, always seeking the most challenging trails.
meanings.sent5: The extremest in the class was known for their unconventional ideas.

meanings.definition: Of the highest or greatest degree.
meanings.sent1: The extremest heat of summer made it unbearable to be outside.
meanings.sent2: The extremest storm of the year caused widespread damage.
meanings.sent3: The extremest flavor of ice cream was surprisingly spicy.
meanings.sent4: Her extremest dedication to her craft led to remarkable success.
meanings.sent5: The extremest mountain peak seemed to touch the sky.
